Articles.Content:
I stranded some kerbonauts on Vall, and I found Jool's Joolostationary orbit radius!

It is 15018km, or incredibly close to it. This gives an orbital period (and thus rotation period) of ten hours, nineteen seconds. This is one second less than the value Mechjeb gives me for the orbit I'm in...

There are no pictures as my print screen button AND F1 button haver stopped working...

Edited October 6, 2012 by SunJumper
Fun!
I dropped one Kerb on the surface of each moon (cept Bop, and Gilly. They are cursed)
